ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
dont waste practice points on evocation. dump one or two points into it and
spend a night in a newbie area using the spell. it would be a waste to put
points into something that is easily raised by going out and casting it.

At 04:25 PM 12/1/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>You can dump them all in at once. I still think its a bad idea though.
<snip>



What is there to put the points into if not Evocation? Aside from 20 into
Jewel Craft as I have already primed it with one point, I will have 10
Training points to spend at 8th level.
What do we get that I would need to save the points for? After 8th, by the
time I hit 16th, I will have 60 more training points. And then until 20th I
can only spend 1 point in research at 16-19. I think this is correct.
I could prime my 1H Blunt and 2H Blunt, but I am waiting a bit on those as I
do not have either of those weapons yet. If I do change from piercing to 1H
or 2H Blunt by 8th I will still have 8 points to spend. Should I save them?
